entry.string: Bism Allah Arrahman Arraheem! You are Abu Mansur 'abd ar-Rahman al-Qazzaz and you live in Baghdad in the 6th century AH. Baghdad belongs to the Baghdad caliphate, which is ruled by the Abbasid puppet caliph al-Fadl al-Mustarshid, although the real power is in the hands of the Persian Shi'a-Buwayhids. Your parents have just been killed in turmoil, which began when the puppet caliph tried to remove himself from the hold of the Persian sultan Mas'ud. You are a Shi'a Muslim. Your father left you as an inheritance a small piece of land outside the Baghdad city. You are a good seafarer and navigator. The monetary unit of your country is a silver dirham. Bissalama!
You are in desperate need of money!

org.spicetrade.tools.Spicebean.name: I will go to the bank and mortgage my farm.
I will go to see my uncle Abdullah.
I will go and work in the port.
I will go to Najaf and ask the Sufi saint Nadir for advice.
I will go and ask the Jeh Urûdhayant witch for advice.
I will go to the bazaar and buy spice seedlings.
I will go to the bazaar and hire farm workers to work on my field.
I will go the bar at the port and buy drugs.
I will pay my wife's dowry.
I will go to the sultan's palace and buy more land.

entry.string: Salam Aleikom! Do you want to hear Gods advice? I cannot help you, only God can. Select one of these three jars and see how God will bless you!
God blesses you by giving you a tip on the location of the Zarathustran gold treasure.
God blesses you by giving you a piece of the map that tells the location of an Assyrian god king's grave.

org.spicetrade.tools.Spicebean.name: luxury products (fabric, rug, jewelry, incense, perfume, coffee,...)
works of art (miniature, poem, statue, musical performance,...)

entry.string: God is favourable to you. He shows you the way to the hidden imam Mahdi. How he can help you is not in my hands! But before you can face Mahdi, you must prove the purity of your heart and the sincerity of your intent. You can do this by making a pilgrimage to the Mevlana grave in Konya, Turkey, by retreating to the mountains for six months to live as a hermit, or by choosing from two goblets, one contains poison and the other contains holy shahdanag potion.

org.spicetrade.tools.Spicebean.name: I will go on a pilgrimage to Konya.
I will go and live as a hermit in the mountains.
I will leave my fate in God's hands!

entry.string: You drank poison. Hurry home and call for a doctor!

org.spicetrade.tools.Spicebean.name: Ok
org.spicetrade.tools.Spicebean.action: mf.player.addAddiction("poisoned", 50);mf.gotoPlace(mf.player.place);if(mf.player.journal.has("nadir11"))mf.player.journal.done("nadir11", "§- I drank poison from the goblet!");

entry.string: You chose the goblet with holy shahdanag potion. You will soon fall asleep and Mahdi will appear to you!
Ahlan wa sahlan! You are just in time. I just got holy water from Abu Madyan, who just arrived from the shrine of Imam Hussein in Kerbela. It is your only hope!
You come too late. I cannot help you. I have no antidote for the kind of potion you have taken! A healthy man does not gamble like that!

org.spicetrade.tools.Spicebean.name: Then there is no hope for me.. (You die of poisoning)
org.spicetrade.tools.Spicebean.action: mf.gotoPlace(mf.player.place);mf.gotoDeath("Abu was poisoned and went to see the doctor in Baghdad, but there was nothing to be done.", 3);

entry.string: Bism Allah Arrahman Arraheem! I am Mahdi, the hidden imam. God will help everybody who believes in Him. Borak will take you to the grave of an Assyrian god king. You will also get Fatima's hand, which will protect you against evil eye and curses.

org.spicetrade.tools.Spicebean.name: Ok
org.spicetrade.tools.Spicebean.action: String done = "§- Mahdi had Borak take me to the grave site in Baku";String grave = ""; if(!mf.player.journal.isDone("grave1")&&!mf.player.journal.has("grave1"))grave="grave1";else if(!mf.player.journal.isDone("grave2")&&!mf.player.journal.has("grave2"))grave="grave2";else if(!mf.player.journal.isDone("grave3")&&!mf.player.journal.has("grave3"))grave="grave3";else if(!mf.player.journal.isDone("grave4")&&!mf.player.journal.has("grave4"))grave="grave4";else if(!mf.player.journal.isDone("grave5")&&!mf.player.journal.has("grave5"))grave="grave5";else if(!mf.player.journal.isDone("grave6")&&!mf.player.journal.has("grave6"))grave="grave6";else grave="grave7"; mf.player.journal.done(grave, done);mf.player.buyItem("11015",0);mf.player.to(476, 368);mf.player.toHomeCountry(202,339,"baku","Baku");mf.gotoPlace(grave);

entry.string: Borak has brought you to the grave of Tiglath-Pileser I, where you find 10 silver dirhams, statue, mask, incense, perfume, rugs, Fatima's hand, Fatima's eye, shahdanag potion, love potion, Suleiman, a lamp occupied by a good dzinn, and buckle of the guardian god Ningizzia that will protect your property.
Bandits attack you: you must fight!
Salam alaikum! You called me. I can see that you have led a decent and dutiful life. God blesses his own with wealth and health already in this life. What do you want?
So shall it be. Borak will take you back home. But remember to build a shrine for Hafaza to retain your blessing.

I cannot help you, but Borak will take you to Hafaza. However, before Hafaza will accept you, your deeds must be weighted and it must be ensured that you have done more good deeds than bad. But remember to build a shrine for Hafaza to retain your blessing.
You have done more bad in your life than good. I cannot help you.
I have heard your prayer and will destroy the rat packs on your fields! My blessing will protect you as long as your good deeds outweigh your bad deeds.

entry.string: I have heard your prayer and will let the rain fall on your fields! My blessing will protect you as long as your good deeds outweigh your bad deeds.
You called me. I can see that you have led a decent and dutiful life. God blesses his own with wealth and health already in this life. What do you want?

org.spicetrade.tools.Spicebean.name: Remove the drought from my fields!
Destroy the rat pack on my fields!
Transfer me quickly to another place!
I want to be able to contact you directly!

entry.string: I will give Borak to your service.
Marhaba! My name is Ghazalah, what is your name?

org.spicetrade.tools.Spicebean.name: Would you share a glass of wine with me? (I give him the love potion)

entry.string: Jobs available! Do you need quick cash?

I will pay 10 000 dirhams to build a library, get the workers!
I will pay 10 000 dirhams to build a shrine to Hafaza, get the workers!

entry.string: There is the sultan's ship that needs unloading.

org.spicetrade.tools.Spicebean.name: I want to load the sultan's ship
I want to do something more profitable

entry.string: Here is your salary, 15 silver dirhams.
I can help you. Do you need some arrangements in your life? I can get you money or sell you love potion. If you have more extreme wishes, I can present you to my master!
Sad news! Your uncle Abdullah is dead. You have inherited 1000 silver dirhams.

entry.string: So you want to meet Yima. Everything has its price. Yima is a powerful daeva and requires a sacrifice. He will only accept hashish or opium. Do you have them?
Good, let's go! Come to my cave next night.
I cannot help you. You must first go and buy drugs in the Sheitan's Bazaar at the port.
I will sacrifice the drugs to Yima on this altar and call him up!

org.spicetrade.tools.Spicebean.name: Ok (Jeh sacrifices two piles of hashish)
Ok (Jeh sacrifices a pile of opium)

entry.string: Mortal, what do you want? I can help you, but remember that I will collect my reward later and then you must give me what I ask for!
I can see that you already have a long history of bad deeds! Do you want me to present you to my master?
I am Iblis! What do you want? I can fulfil your wish, but remember that I will collect my reward later and then you must give me what I ask for!

org.spicetrade.tools.Spicebean.name: Transfer me quickly to another place!
I want to be able to contact you directly!

org.spicetrade.tools.Spicebean.name: Ok, I will pay the price you ask

entry.string: I will give you a necklace that you can use to contact me anywhere!
I came to demand my reward for presenting you to Yima: you must give me half of your next crop!

entry.string: Your spice business is blooming. You have acquired wealth and influence. Now you can afford dowry.
I am Maria de La Chesnaye-Desbois.
I am Klara Recke v. der Horst.
I am Aliz von Alsó-Szopor Ladislaus.
I am Lady Louisa May Alcott.
What a delightful poem! Who is the woman in the poem, the one who is consuming the man?
You! Would you be willing to marry me?
I cannot answer that. You must first speak with my father.
Never! I would rather die!!!! Go away, you musulman!
I am Umm al-Khair Amat al-Jabbar.
I cannot answer that. You must first speak with my father.
Never! I would rather die!!!! My heart already belongs to another!
You cannot pay dowry, because you do not have a bride yet! Get one first!
The father of your bride has accepted the dowry.
You do not have enough money to pay the dowry. Go to speak with the father of the bride after you have collected the sum needed for the dowry.
I came to pay the dowry!
Everything is ready for the wedding!!!!
Do you need some love potion? It's cheap...

You are a successful merchant. I will be happy to give you my daughter to be your wife, but I want 10 silver dirhams as the dowry. Additionally, you will get a quarter of a map about which I do not understand anything.

I am not especially fond of you, but you are an influential man. I will give you my daughter to be your wife, but as the dowry, I want 10 silver dirhams and a part of your profits. After this, we will be allies and will not wage war against each other.

You are a successful and influential man. I will be happy to give you my daughter to be your wife, but first you must destroy one of my enemies. Hasan-i-Sabah has again started to build side fortresses for his Alamut fortress. One of these is close to the city of Anjudan. Go and destroy this fortress.

org.spicetrade.tools.Spicebean.name: I will do this for you!

Congratulations, you completed the first task. Next, you must weave a rug for my daughter!
Congratulations, you completed the second task. Your last task is to find a fetish for my daughter to protect her from all evil!

Congratulations, you have completed all the tasks I demanded from you. You have shown your courage and strength, your skills and sophistication, and your faith in God. Take my daughter and make her your wife!

Build me a gazebo, so we can meet there!
Thank you for a wonderful gift. I will help you to complete the task!
You are asking too much from me, but a small gift would make me to reconsider! Build me a gazebo!

entry.string: Your heart is suffering of loneliness, you should find some company for yourself.

entry.string: Bism Allah Arrahman Arraheem! I am Mahdi, the hidden imam. God will help everybody who believes in Him. I will grant you an incredibly rich harvest.
I will give you a blessing, go in peace.
Kaif halak? You called me. I can see that you have led a decent and dutiful life. God blesses his own with wealth and health already in this life. What do you want?
So shall it be. God bless you. Borak will take you back home, inshallah!
I will give you a rosary, which you can use to call me for help.
Which building permit do you want? Remember that this is a great honour and you must show gratitude to the Sultan by donating 5000 silver dirhams to his coffers, before you can be allowed to build.

org.spicetrade.tools.Spicebean.name: I do not have money for a permit right now.

org.spicetrade.tools.Spicebean.name: I am in desperate need of money, uncle!

entry.string: Marhaba Abu, my favourite nephew! How are you? Have you seen my daughter, Umm al-Jabbar?

org.spicetrade.tools.Spicebean.name: No I have not yet seen her
I am in desperate need of money, uncle!

entry.string: Marhaba, Abu! How are you? Have you seen my daughter, Umm al-Jabbar, yet?

org.spicetrade.tools.Spicebean.name: No I have not yet seen her
I am in desperate need of money, uncle!

entry.string: So you want money? I can lend you 300 silver dirhams, but you must pay them back quickly. I am not made of money!

org.spicetrade.tools.Spicebean.name: Please lend me the money
org.spicetrade.tools.Spicebean.action: mf.player.journal.open("abdullah1", "§- I must pay Abdullah 300 silver dirhams back");mf.player.money+=300;mf.gotoPlace(mf.player.place);

entry.string: I can see you are a wealthy man Abu. Why don't you go and talk to her, I hear her in the window outside.
My daughter is the age of marriage, and I also need an heir to my family. So if someone of you would like to ask her hand, you have to find and bring me back the buckle of the guardian god Ningizzia.

org.spicetrade.tools.Spicebean.name: I will be the one to bring you this buckle!

org.spicetrade.tools.Spicebean.name: Let me tell you about all the treasures I have discovered on my journeys
Feeling great, after all my adventures in Europe
I am a very powerful man, and have many powerful friends!
I have a great business empire
May I tell you about all the wonderful artwork I have seen in European museums and churches
I am fine, how are you?
I have suffered so much lately!

entry.string: Oh! That all sounds very interesting, I would love to hear more later.

Can you help me to get the permits?
